column1: Little Goat Diner////We had a 45 minute wait when we got there at 11am on a Sunday morning.  We had the crab dip
column3: the goat burger open face with fries and chile
column4: and the pork tenderloin sandwich. WOW.  Everything was delicious and I don't think we finished any dish
column5: as the portions are large. The service staff were all very nice and helpful.  We would return one day
column6: although its hard to justify the wait when there is Au Cheval at the other end of the block.
